message.body: Will you send me the info for your driving place?
Sure I'll ask my mom for it. What kind of class are you looking forÂ
Idk... I need driving practice and I need to sit thru drivers ed
Ok well I'm getting lessons from Atila's driving school. If you have a permit they can take you for driving lessons, sign you up for drivers Ed classes and set up a road test for you
Cool. Thanks. I have a permit so I'm good to go
